home.title: 首页看板
home.description: Binner是一款为创客、爱好者和专业人士设计的库存管理系统。

inventory.privatePartInfo: 非标器件数据手动录入
inventory.privatePartInfoMessage: 录入非标元器件或自定义元器件数据
inventory.chooseAlternatePart: 改用其他可替代品牌，(共{{count}}种)

placeholder.keywords: 输入关键字，多个关键字以空格分隔

message.uploadWait: 必须先保存元器件，之后才能上传文件。

popup.bulkAddParts: 使用扫码枪批量添加零部件
popup.lowStock: 当库存量低于该阈值时会被标红进行预警提醒
popup.location: 记录元器件所在仓库楼层及房号
popup.binNumber: 记录元器件所在格子或货架位置，暂不支持中文字符
popup.rememberLastSelection: 勾选启用上次选择的值: <1>零件分类, 安装方法, 数量, 缺货预警值, 项目, 位置, 货架号1, 货架号2</1>
popup.mustAddPart: 添加供应商条目之前，必须先保存当前元器件信息

lowInventory.title: 缺货预警
lowInventory.description: 标记出库存无货以及库存量偏低的元器件。<1/>允许为每个元器件设定缺货预警<3>阈值</3>。

header.title: BOM管理
header.description: 创建BOM清单、创建PCB以及添加所需物料明细。

bom.notEnoughPartsToProducePcb: 物料数量不足。无法生产PCB板
bom.notEnoughPartsToProduceBom: 物料数量不足，无法生产全套BOM。
bom.noPartsAssigned: 请为PCB板设定所需物料明细，以便计算可生产套数。
bom.pcbProduceCount: 当前库存最多可生产<1>{{count}}</1>套。
bom.bomProduceCount: 当前库存最多可生产<1>{{count}}</1>套完整BOM套件。
bom.lowestPcb: 受库存限制，<0>{{name}}</0>的预估能组装生产的件数最少。

header.description:
你可以使用物料清单工具，按照项目来管理零部件。你可以直接按照PCB板的套数扣除对应零件数量，或者检查还需要购买哪些零件以及分析成本。

请选择或创建需要管理BOM的项目。

partTypes.title: 元器件类别
partTypes.description: 按类别划分元器件。通过指定<1>父级结点</1>可以无限扩展类别树状结构。<3 />例如：运算放大器(运放)类器件一般被归入IC集成电路的子类别，录入信息时就应将运放子类别的父级结点指定为IC集成电路。

exportData.title: 导入/导出数据
exportData.description: 在此导入Binner数据库或导出为人类可读的格式。
exportData.uploadNote: 将文件拖动到此处，或鼠标点击此处然后从目录中选择文件
exportData.totalProjectsImported: 本次总计导入工程数量
exportData.totalPartTypesImported: 本次总计导入元器件类别数量
exportData.totalPartsImported: 本次总计导入元器件数量

tools.title: 小工具
tools.description: 包含几个电气工程师常备的小工具。

barcodeScanner.title: 扫码枪小程序
barcodeScanner.description: 此处可测试扫码枪扫描结果。

settings.title: 系统配置
settings.description: 主要包括对接第三方网站、配置本地打印机以及创建条码标签模板。<1 /> 使用说明参见在线<3>Wiki</3>手册（目前只有英文帮助文档，位于Github网站）

confirm.mustAuthenticate: 你需要先认证才能使用外部接口。在服务提供商认证完成后，页面将会重新定向回来。

settings.integrationsDescription: 要对接集成第三方网站，包括：德捷电子(DigiKey)、贸泽电子(Mouser)、艾睿电子(Arrow)，以及Octopart和Nexar等电子零件搜索引擎的API接口，请将第三方网站提供的API接口令牌导入本系统。<1 />借助第三方网站API接口提供的海量电子元器件数据，能够显著提升。
settings.swarmDescription: Swarm is a free API service provided by <1>Binner's cloud service</1> that contains part metadata from many aggregate sources. It is the primary source of part, media and datasheet information. Registering for your own API Keys will give you higher request limits and can be obtained at <3>https://binner.io/swarm</3>
settings.digikeyDescription: Digikey API Keys are free and can be obtained at <1>https://developer.digikey.com/</1>
settings.digikeySupport: 接入DigiKey(德捷电子)第三方数据接口
settings.mouserDescription: Mouser API Keys can be obtained at <1>https://www.mouser.com/api-hub/</1>
settings.mouserSupport: 接入Mouser(贸泽电子)第三方数据接口
settings.arrowDescription: Arrow API Keys can be obtained at <1>https://developers.arrow.com/api/index.php/site/page?view=requestAPIKey</1>
settings.arrowSupport: 接入Arrow(艾睿电子)第三方数据接口
settings.octopartNexar: Octopart/Nexar 电子元器件搜索引擎
settings.octopartNexarDescription: Octopart/Nexar API Keys can be obtained at <1>https://portal.nexar.com/sign-up</1>
settings.octopartNexarSupport: 接入 Octopart/Nexar 电子元器件搜索引擎
settings.printerConfigDescription: Configure your printer name as it shows up in your environment (Windows Printers or CUPS Printer Name)
settings.partLabelTemplateDescription: 将按照此模板打印零件标签

popup.forgetCredentials: Forget any cached credentials and force reauthentication with DigiKey
popup.swarmEnabled: Choose if you would like to enable Binner Swarm support.
popup.swarmApiKey: Swarm api key is optional. By registering a free or paid api key you will receive higher request limits accordingly.
popup.swarmTimeout: Swarm api request timeout. Default: '00:00:05' (5 seconds)
popup.digikeyEnabled: Choose if you would like to enable DigiKey support. You will occasionally be asked to login to your DigiKey account to allow Binner to access your information.
popup.digikeySite: Choose the DigiKey site to use.
popup.digikeyClientId: Your DigiKey <1>Client ID</1>.<3><4/>Figure 1. DigiKey Client Id settings</3>
popup.digikeyClientSecret: Your DigiKey <1>Client Secret</1>.<3><4/>Figure 1. DigiKey Client Secret settings</3>
popup.digikeyApiUrl: DigiKey's API Url. This will either be <1>api.digikey.com</1> (live) or <3>sandbox-api.digikey.com</3> (for testing only)
popup.digikeyOAuthPostbackUrl: Binner's postback url must be registered with DigiKey exactly as specified here, on DigiKey this is named <1>Callback URL</1>. This should almost always be localhost, and no firewall settings are required as your web browser will be making the request.<3/><4/><5>Example: </5><6>localhost:8090/Authorization/Authorize</6><7/><8><9/>Figure 1. DigiKey Callback URL</8>
popup.mouserEnabled: Choose if you would like to enable Mouser support.
popup.mouserSearchApiKey: Your api key for accessing the search api.
popup.mouserOrderApiKey: Your api key for accessing the orders api.
popup.mouserCartApiKey: Your api key for accessing the shopping cart api.
popup.mouserApiUrl: Mouser's API Url. This will be api.mouser.com
popup.arrowEnabled: Choose if you would like to enable Arrow support.
popup.arrowApiUrl: Arrow's API Url. This will be api.arrow.com
popup.octopartEnabled: Choose if you would like to enable Octopart/Nexar support.
popup.printerPrinterName: Your printer name as it appears in Windows, or CUPS (Unix).
popup.printerPartLabelSource: The label paper source to use.
popup.partLabelName: The name of the label model installed in your printer. This will be specific to your printer, and must be defined in your appsettings.json under <1>WebHostServiceConfiguration.PrinterConfiguration.LabelDefinitions</1>

orderImport.title: 导入采购订单
orderImport.enterOrderNumber: 输入第三方网站采购单号。
orderImport.webOrderNum: 订单号（贸泽电子的Web Order #）
orderImport.instructions: For <1>DigiKey(德捷电子)</1> orders, this is the <3>Sales Order #</3>.<4 />For <6>Mouser(贸泽电子)</6> orders, this is the <8>Web Order #</8>.<10 />For <12>Arrow(艾睿电子)</12> orders, this is the <14>Order Number</14>.
orderImport.mouserNote: <0>备注：</0> Mouser(贸泽电子) only supports Web Order # so make sure when importing that you are using the Web Order # and <2>not the Sales Order #</2>
orderImport.arrowNote: <0>备注：</0> Arrow(艾睿电子) requires that you first request access to their Order API by sending them an email. See <2>Arrow Order Api</2>

printLabels.title: 打印标签卡
printLabels.description: Print custom multi-line labels for your storage bins.<1 />Print history is kept so you can reuse templates for your labels.
printLabels.addLineToStart: Add a line to get started.
printLabels.barcodeFontsNotice: Barcode fonts may be problematic. Values must be surrounded by asterix, ex: *value* or parenthesis, ex: (value) to encode correctly. For best accuracy use a font size of [6, 12, 18, 24, 30, 36]. Alternatively, toggle IsBarcode and a barcode will be drawn for you and no special characters needed.

project.title: 编辑工程
project.description: 项目被用作你的BOM的一部分，允许你将零件与多个PCB相关联。

popup.name: 输入工程名称或BOM清单名称
popup.color: 添加彩色标识，便于工程分类或快速选取
popup.includeUnassociated: Indicates if parts not associated with a PCB were produced

ohmsLaw.title: 欧姆定律换算
ohmsLaw.description: Ohms Law explains the relationship between voltage, current and resistance. Input any 2 values to calculate the other 2 values.

voltDividerCalc.title: 分压电阻计算
voltDividerCalc.description: A voltage divider uses 2 resistors to reduce a voltage to a fraction of its input voltage.

accountSettings.title: 账号设置
accountSettings.description: 配置账号基本信息及登录密码

users.title: 登录账号管理
users.canNotDeleteAdmin: 不允许删除超级管理员账号
users.userAdded: 已成功添加账号! 邮箱地址为：{{emailAddress}}

popup.name: 此处请填写账号姓名
popup.emailAddress: 此处请填写英文登录名或Email邮箱

activateLicense.title: 激活许可
activateLicense.description: Enter your license key to enable pro features on your local Binner installation. Don't have a license key? Visit <1>Binner Cloud</1>

updateParts.title: 更新零件详情
updateParts.description: Refresh information from external APIs and choose which fields you would like to update.

backup.title: 备份/还原
backup.description: 创建备份或还原到之前的备份状态。
backup.backupDescription: 创建当前系统的快照备份。

bc.updatePartMetadata: 更新元器件基础信息数据库

barcodeScannerInput.supportsBarcodeScanning: 当前页面支持扫码录入。<1>条码/二维码录入功能简介</1>……

popup.lowStock: 若数量低于该阈值，则应及时采购补货。

confirm.deletePart: 真的确定要删除元器件{{partNumber}}吗?

error.failedSave: 错误! 保存元器件{{partNumber}}时发生错误，信息如下: {{statusText}}

addBomPartModal.title: BOM管理
addBomPartModal.description: 在BOM中添加一个零件，可以选择将其与特定的PCB联系起来
addBomPartModal.confirmAddUnassociated: You have not selected a part from your inventory.<1/>Are you sure you want to add this part <3>{{keyword}}</3> without associating it to a part in your inventory?<5/><6/><7>Note: You will still be able to manage it's quantity if you choose to proceed, but it will not appear in your inventory.</7>

popup.selectPcb: Select the pcb you would like to add parts to. If you choose not to select a PCB, the part will be added to your BOM without PCB associations.
popup.quantity: Enter the quantity of this part required to produce a single PCB.
popup.referenceIds: Enter a custom Reference Id you can use for identifying this part.<1/>Examples: <3>Optoisolator1</3>, <5>Capacitor Array</5>
popup.schematicReferenceIds: Enter one or more Schematic Reference Ids you can use for identifying this part on the PCB silkscreen.<1/>Examples: <3>D1</3>, <5>C2</5>, <7>Q1</7>
popup.notes: Enter any custom notes for this part.
popup.partNumber: Search for a part in your inventory
popup.customDescription: Enter your own custom description for this part.

addPcbModal.title: BOM管理
addPcbModal.description: Adding a PCB allows you to associate your parts with a specific PCB, and even multiple PCBs within a project.

popup.name: 输入PCB板或模块的名称
popup.description: Enter a description describing what your pcb does. (<1>optional</1>)
popup.quantity: Enter a quantity (multiplier) of PCB's produced each time you create a PCB. This should normally be 1, unless you require several copies of the same PCB for producing your BOM project.<1/><2/><3>Example:</3> An audio amplifier may require 2 of the same PCB's, one for each left/right channel each time you produce the entire assembly.
popup.cost: The cost to produce a single PCB board (without components). If using quantity, only specify the cost for a single board as quantity will be taken into consideration.
popup.serialNumberFormat: Enter your serial number format as a string. The left-most portion of the string will be incremented by 1 each time you produce a PCB. (<1>optional</1>)<2/>Example: <4>SN00000000</4>

options.allDescription: BOM清单内的全部PCB板，外加独立零部件

popup.pcbs: 请选择计划生产的PCB板。若当前BOM工程中不包含任何PCB板，也可点击【独立零部件】或点击【全部】，之后继续进行生产备料
popup.quantity: 输入计划生产的PCB板数量
popup.nextSerialNumber: 下一个分配给PCB板的产品序列号
popup.outOfStock: 当前共有多少种元器件已经无库存
popup.serialNumber: 下一块PCB的产品序列号自此向后递增

popup.content: 模板可以引用任意字段内容。例如: {partNumber}, {description}, {manufacturer}, {location}, {binNumber}, {cost} 等等。具体格式参见<1>Wiki</1>帮助文档
popup.upperCaseText: 将所有英文字母转换为大写
popup.lowerCaseText: 将所有英文字母转换为小写
popup.rotateDegrees: 顺时针旋转文字的角度。例如: 90

label.name: 名称
label.mountingType: 组装方式（贴片式/直插式）
label.primaryDatasheetUrl: 规格书数据手册下载地址
label.rememberLastSelection: 记住最后一次所填内容

message.noMatchingResults: 未搜到与之相匹配的条目。
message.noPartInfo: No part information is available for '{{partNumber}}'. You are subscribed to updates and will be automatically updated when the part is indexed.
message.unableToUpload: 无法上传. 请检查文件是否被锁定或被删除
message.noFilesSelected: 你还没有选择需要上传的文件!
message.failedSavePart: 更新失败, 请检查零件分类和安装方式

confirm.deleteProject: 确定删除此项目以及整个BOM吗?
confirm.removeBomParts: 确定从BOM中删除 <1>{{quantity}}</1> 个零件吗?
confirm.deletePcb: 确定从BOM中删除此PCB及其零件吗?
confirm.deletePartType: 确定删除零件分类： <1>{{name}}</1> 吗?
confirm.deleteLocalFile: 确定删除本地文件 <1>{{name}}</1> 吗?
confirm.permanent: 此操作是 <1>永久生效且无法恢复的</1>.
confirm.deleteHistory: 确定删除这条历史记录吗?
confirm.partsWillBeBackInStock: 所有被使用的零件将会被 <1>重新增补会库存中</1>.

error.invalidOrder: 输入非法，不是合法的订单号!
error.failedDeleteRecord: 未能删除该条生产记录!

success.producedPcbs: 已扣除用于生产{{quantity}}张PCB所需的物料!
success.savedPartType: 元器件类别已重命名为{{name}}。

bom.producePcb: 备注：装配PCB板的同时，库存元器件数量将被自动扣除
bom.filterOutOfStock: 是否筛选只显示缺货器件
bom.pcb: Indicates which PCB your part is assigned to. A PCB assignment is optional, all unassigned parts will appear in the <1>All</1> tab.
bom.quantity: 装配单张PCB板所需消耗多少元器件
bom.referenceId: 自定义<1 />参考ID，用于区分不同的元器件
bom.schematicReferenceId: <1 />元器件位号列表，逐一对应PCB板上的元器件位号丝印。<3/>例如：<5>D1</5>, <7>C2</7>, <9>Q1</9>
bom.displayAll: Displays all parts including parts not associated with a PCB.
bom.unassociatedPartName: Edit the name of your unassociated <1 /> part
bom.editReferenceId: 修改自定义的<1 />参考ID。该ID被用于区分不同的元器件
bom.editSchematicReferenceId: 修改自定义<1 />元器件位号列表。应逐一对应PCB板上的元器件位号丝印。<3/>例如：<5>D1</5>, <7>C2</7>, <9>Q1</9>

versionBanner.newVersion: 最新版本 Binner <1>{{version}}</1> 现已发布!
